title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
OB: After importing a new image into the layout, the original image is still displayed instead of the new image.
EB: Expected result: The new image should be displayed after importing it into the layout.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Import the new image 'image1.jpg' into the layout. 2. Check if the new image is displayed correctly.
